title: Google Opinion Rewards expands into five new countries
content:
As a way to accrue some free Play Store credit by answering surveys and questionnaires, Google Opinion Rewards is a neat application to have on your Android device. Since its launch, the app is now available in over 30 countries with a further five being added in recent days.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Opinion Rewards expands into five new countries appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google Opinion Rewards app is now available in over 30 countries with a further five being added in recent days.
